item.title: Muslims pelted stones at Ganesh idol in Karnataka? Hindu groups’ scuffle given false communal spin
item.description:
<![CDATA[Amid Ganesh Chaturthi celebrations across the country, a video of two individuals hurling objects from a rooftop at a procession carrying the deity went viral. Several social media shared the video, claiming that the individuals were Muslims and pelting stones at the procession.
Kreately Media, which has shared communal misinformation on several occasions, shared the video on X on September 4 and wrote, “They hate idol worshippers”. (Archive)
Another X user, @wokeflix_, also shared the video w...]]>
